info.name: Spring-API-REST-WAREHOUSE-MANAGEMENT REST petitions - AssociateArticles
info.description:
# Requests for API REST Crud warehousemanagement.

* Include: GET, DEL, PUT, POST.

item.name: 01-POST: add a new AssociateArticles in the DB

request.description:
* Creating a new AssociateArticles using POST /api/v1.0/warehousemanagement/manageAssociateArticles API
* localhost:8081/api/v1.0/warehousemanagement/manageAssociateArticles
*

item.name: 02-GET: retrieving all warehousemanagement AssociateArticles stored in DB

request.description:
* Retrieving all warehousemanagement using GET /api/v1.0/warehousemanagement/getAllAssociateArticles API
* localhost:8081/api/v1.0/warehousemanagement/getAllAssociateArticles

item.name: 03-GET: retrieving a single AssociateArticles by id

request.description:
* Retrieving a single AssociateArticles using GET /api/v1.0/warehousemanagement/getAssociateArticles/{associateArticlesId} API
* localhost:8081/v1.0/api/warehousemanagement/getAssociateArticles/1

item.name: 04- PUT: updating a AssociateArticles by his id

request.description:
* Updating a AssociateArticles using PUT /api/v1.0/warehousemanagement/manageAssociateArticles/{associateArticlesId} API
* localhost:8080/api/v1.0/warehousemanagement/manageAssociateArticles/1
*

item.name: 05- DEL: deleting a AssociateArticles by id stored in DB

request.description:
* Deleting a AssociateArticles using DELETE /api/v1.0/warehousemanagement/deleteAssociateArticles/{associateArticlesId} API
* localhost:8081/api/v1.0/warehousemanagement/deleteAssociateArticles/1
